About

I am the leader of the Microsoft Azure business group in the Netherlands. I have over 15 years of experience in management, go-to-market strategy, and marketing in the IT industry, working with customers and partners across all sectors. My team of Azure experts help organizations transform their business with cloud solutions that are innovative, scalable, and secure. I'm also an avid learner, traveler and sports enthusiast.

Experience

  • Microsoft

    15 years 10 months

    • BUSINESS GROUP LEAD - MICROSOFT AZURE

      Microsoft

      Nov 2017 - Present6 years

      Netherlands

      The Business Group Lead for Azure (Cloud & AI) has end-to-end accountability for the Azure, SQL Server, Windows Server, System Center, and Visual Studio businesses in the Netherlands, including planning, execution and governance. This also includes revenue, scorecard, and market share accountabilities and goals. I play a leadership role within extended leadership meetings, and I participate in planning and governance processes. I also provide data and insights to support and drive effective…

      The Business Group Lead for Azure (Cloud & AI) has end-to-end accountability for the Azure, SQL Server, Windows Server, System Center, and Visual Studio businesses in the Netherlands, including planning, execution and governance. This also includes revenue, scorecard, and market share accountabilities and goals. I play a leadership role within extended leadership meetings, and I participate in planning and governance processes. I also provide data and insights to support and drive effective business prioritization and decision-making to achieve our goals.

      Other responsibilities include:
      - As BG Lead I am responsible for close cross-group collaboration across segments ensuring local execution of strategies and tactics to further drive the business.
      - Building deep audience insight, including audience segmentation, attitudes, and purchase behaviors. Based on these insights, I build relevant customer offers and co-marketing partnerships, and I integrate these into the commercial and consumer sales motions.
      - I am the ambassador for the product brand and I am responsible for overseeing and managing the investments in broad marketing and digital media outreach initiatives.
      - I have a deep understanding of the products, go-to-market strategies, competitive landscape, local business opportunity and climate in their local market or Area.
      - I am the ambassador for the product brand externally and internally
      - Finally, as business group lead I am on point for reporting back to Corp on the success metrics (scorecard) as part of the rhythm of the business process.

    • BUSINESS LEAD MICROSOFT AZURE - CLOUD & ENTERPRISE DIVISION

      Microsoft Nederland

      Jan 2016 - Nov 20171 year 11 months

      Amsterdam Area, Netherlands

      I led the Azure business in the Netherlands. I was responsible for the development and execution of the all up Azure plan, and I reported back to the leadership team on the progress that we make. Our goal was (1) to help existing customers to successfully transform their businesses, with the use of Azure technology, and (2) to win new customers to the Azure platform. I worked together with the partner unit to ensure partner capacity across the Infrastructure, Data, and Application propositions,…

      I led the Azure business in the Netherlands. I was responsible for the development and execution of the all up Azure plan, and I reported back to the leadership team on the progress that we make. Our goal was (1) to help existing customers to successfully transform their businesses, with the use of Azure technology, and (2) to win new customers to the Azure platform. I worked together with the partner unit to ensure partner capacity across the Infrastructure, Data, and Application propositions, and to drive co-sell of these partner solutions. We also acquired new customers through Enterprise and direct sales, and through innovative, modern marketing practices.

    • SENIOR PRODUCT MARKETING MANAGER CLOUD INFRA AND ENT MOBILITY MANAGEMENT - CLOUD & ENTERPRISE

      Microsoft Nederland

      Apr 2014 - Dec 20151 year 9 months

      Amsterdam Area, Netherlands

      Accountable for all related revenue, scorecards, and market share metrics. A key aspect is to work with the segment marketers, sales, and partner teams to create impactful marketing strategy and lead execution plans. Another aspect is to make sure that the content, timing, and delivery of marketing messages to customers and partners are well aligned.

    • PRODUCT MARKETING MANAGER WINDOWS SERVER - CLOUD & ENTERPRISE

      Microsoft

      Jan 2010 - Mar 20144 years 3 months

      Amsterdam Area, Netherlands

      Product marketing manager for Microsoft’s Cloud & Enterprise division, responsible for the Windows Server business and all related metrics. Contributions included:
      - Created marketing strategy and led the execution of Windows Server campaigns with OEMs
      - Launches of Windows Server 2008R2/2012 and Microsoft Azure
      - Worked with hosting service providers and developers to increase the Windows Server share of Internet web servers

      The Microsoft Academy for College Hires (MACH) program is an accelerated career development program. It combines on the job experiences with a customized training program and coaching. The marketing program included a one week course at the Kellogg School of Management at the Northwestern University of Chicago, Illinois. Contributions included:
      - Developed Microsoft’s first environmental sustainability target and plan
      - Created a marketing plan for Live@Edu (now ‘Office 365 education’)…

      The Microsoft Academy for College Hires (MACH) program is an accelerated career development program. It combines on the job experiences with a customized training program and coaching. The marketing program included a one week course at the Kellogg School of Management at the Northwestern University of Chicago, Illinois. Contributions included:
      - Developed Microsoft’s first environmental sustainability target and plan
      - Created a marketing plan for Live@Edu (now ‘Office 365 education’), which included the activation of Office 365 in higher education
      - Created a marketing plan for Windows Server Solutions

  • Co-Founder

    J&F Innovations B.V.

    Jul 2005 - Dec 202116 years 6 months

    The Hague Area, Netherlands

    Founder and owner of J&F Innovations B.V. We developed more sustainable cultivation methods for quick-growing stems of tomato, cucumber, and sweet pepper plants. In one of our products, the "Wortelwiel", the stem of the plant was wound up and pressed into substrate material, resulting in the plant forming adventitious roots.
    - J&F was the first organization to extend the 'productive' life of a tomato plant to over two years, which could lead to significant reduction of waste in the growth…

    Founder and owner of J&F Innovations B.V. We developed more sustainable cultivation methods for quick-growing stems of tomato, cucumber, and sweet pepper plants. In one of our products, the "Wortelwiel", the stem of the plant was wound up and pressed into substrate material, resulting in the plant forming adventitious roots.
    - J&F was the first organization to extend the 'productive' life of a tomato plant to over two years, which could lead to significant reduction of waste in the growth and harvest of tomatoes
    - I established partnerships with manufacturers and industry boards
    - I raised funding from governmental bodies and private institutions
